invention-title: Liquid crystal aligning agent, liquid crystal alignment film, and liquid crystal display element
液晶取向剂、液晶取向膜以及液晶显示元件

abstract.p: Provided is a liquid crystal aligning agent with which a liquid crystal display element having a low occurrence rate of display defects (line afterimage) can be obtained even when a negative liquid crystal is used as a liquid crystal material. A liquid crystal aligning agent contains a polymer (A), a polymer (B), and a crosslinkable compound (C). Polymer (A): a polyimide obtained by imidizing a polyimide precursor, which is a reactant of a tetracarboxylic acid derivative component and a diamine component containing a diamine represented by formula (d0) and a diamine represented by formula (dD). Polymer (B): a polyimide precursor which is a reactant of a tetracarboxylic acid derivative component and a diamine component represented by 'H-N (R)-YD'-N (R)-H '(YD' represents a divalent organic group having a group '-N (D')-'(D' represents a protecting group that is removed by heating and substituted by a hydrogen atom) in the molecule. R is the same as R in formula (dD) in terms of meaning) and a diamine represented by formula (dB) (excluding diamine (dD 'B)). The polyimide precursor does not have an imide ring structure. The crosslinkable compound (C) is an epoxy compound represented by formula (En) (in formula (d0), two Ar independently represent a divalent benzene ring, a biphenyl structure or a naphthalene ring, and any hydrogen atom on the ring may be substituted by a monovalent group. Lo represents-O-(-Ar '-O-) n-(n is an integer of 0-3); ar'represents a divalent benzene ring, a biphenyl structure, in which any hydrogen atom on the ring may be substituted by a monovalent group),-(CH2) n-(n is an integer of 2-18), or a group in which at least a portion of-CH2-of the-(CH2) n-is substituted by any of-O-,-C (= O)-, or-O-C (= O)-. In formula (dD), YD represents a divalent organic group having a group "-N (D)-" (D represents a protecting group that is removed by heating and substituted by a hydrogen atom) in the molecule. In formula (d0) and formula (dD), a plurality of Rs each independently represent a hydrogen atom or a monovalent organic group. ) (YB represents a divalent organic group satisfying the following conditions (1) and (2). R and R in the formula (d0) have the same meaning. Condition (1) does not have a nitrogen-atom-containing structure selected from the group consisting of a nitrogen-atom-containing heterocyclic ring, a secondary amino group, and a tertiary amino group (excluding amino groups derived from a group "-N (D ')-" (D' represents a protecting group that is desorbed by heating and substituted by a hydrogen atom). Condition (2): a side chain group having 6 or more carbon atoms is not present in the molecule. (In the formula, a is an integer of 2-4, Ra is an a-valent organic group, and a bonding site with a N is an aliphatic carbon atom. > # imgabs0 # imgabs1 #

本发明提供一种液晶取向剂，其即使在将负型液晶用作液晶材料的情况下也能得到显示不良(线残像)的发生率低的液晶显示元件。一种液晶取向剂，其含有聚合物(A)、聚合物(B)以及交联性化合物(C)。聚合物(A)：将作为如下二胺成分与四羧酸衍生物成分的反应物的聚酰亚胺前体酰亚胺化而得到的聚酰亚胺，所述二胺成分含有式(d0)所示的二胺和式(dD)所示的二胺。聚合物(B)：作为如下二胺成分与四羧酸衍生物成分的反应物的聚酰亚胺前体，所述二胺成分由“H－N(R)－YD’－N(R)－H”(YD’表示在分子内具有基团“－N(D’)－”(D’表示通过加热而脱离并取代为氢原子的保护基)的二价有机基团。R与式(dD)的R含义相同)所示的二胺(dD’B)和下述式(dB)所示的二胺(其中，二胺(dD’B)除外)构成。其中，该聚酰亚胺前体不具有酰亚胺环结构。交联性化合物(C)：式(En)所示的环氧系化合物(式(d0)中，两个Ar各自独立地表示二价苯环、联苯结构或萘环，所述环上的任意氢原子任选地被一价基团取代。Lo表示－O－(－Ar’－O－)n－(n为0～3的整数。Ar’表示二价苯环、联苯结构，所述环上的任意氢原子任选地被一价基团取代)、－(CH2)n－(n为2～18的整数)、或该－(CH2)n－的－CH2－的至少一部分被－O－、－C(＝O)－或－O－C(＝O)－中的任意者取代而成的基团。式(dD)中，YD表示在分子内具有基团“－N(D)－”(D表示通过加热而脱离并取代为氢原子的保护基)的二价有机基团。式(d0)和式(dD)中，多个R各自独立地表示氢原子或一价有机基团。)(YB表示满足以下的条件(1)和(2)的二价有机基团。R与所述式(d0)的R含义相同。)条件(1)：不具有选自由含氮原子的杂环和仲氨基及叔氨基(其中，源自基团“－N(D’)－”(D’表示通过加热而脱离并取代为氢原子的保护基)的氨基除外)构成的组中的含氮原子的结构。条件(2)：在分子内不具有碳原子数6以上的侧链基团。(a为2～4的整数，Ra为a价有机基团，与a个N的键合部位为脂肪族碳原子。)#imgabs0##imgabs1#
